hero.title: Hi, I'm Jayden
hero.subtitle: AI Engineer | Software Developer | Tech Enthusiast
hero.description: Passionate about programming, focused on creating excellent digital experiences. Possessing rich full-stack development experience, enthusiastic about game development and Web technologies.

about.title: About Me
about.p1: I am a passionate AI engineer with years of software development experience. I love learning new technologies, solving complex technical problems, and am committed to creating user-friendly applications.
about.p2: In addition to programming, I have a strong interest in game development, especially using the Godot engine for 2D and 3D game development. I believe technology can change the world, and my goal is to create value through code.

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.desc1: Responsible for front-end and back-end development, using tech stacks like React, Node.js, Python. Participated in the development and maintenance of multiple large-scale projects, improving system performance and user experience.
experience.li1_1: Developed and maintained multiple web applications
experience.li1_2: Optimized database queries, improving system performance by 30%
experience.li1_3: Participated in code reviews and technical solution design
experience.company2: City University of Hong Kong with Prof LEUNG, K W
experience.desc2: Conducted research on GPS antenna optimization, specifically employing the Non-Dominated Sorting Genetic Algorithm II (NSGA-II).
experience.li2_1: Developed and implemented the NSGA-II algorithm for multi-objective optimization.
experience.li2_2: Applied the algorithm to enhance GPS antenna performance and design on High Frequency Structure Simulator (HFSS).
experience.li2_3: Utilized Python, MATLAB for simulations and machine learning for data analysis.
experience.desc3: Focused on back-end development, using computer vision and feature matching. Responsible for the design and implementation of system, ensuring a good user experience.
experience.li3_1: Developed NI LabVIEW device control system for Hong Kong Ocean Park Water World and Studio City Macau
experience.li3_2: Developed Road Scanning Vehicle with C# Control System for Freetech and HK Highways Department
experience.li3_3: Optimized database queries, improving system performance by 30%

proj.rpgDesc: A 2D role-playing game developed using the Godot engine, featuring a complete game system.
proj.ecommerceDesc: A full-stack e-commerce management platform, including user management, product management, order processing, and other functions.
proj.taskAppDesc: A modern task management application supporting team collaboration and real-time updates.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.subtitle: Let's start a conversation
contact.description: If you are interested in my work or have any collaboration opportunities, feel free to contact me!
